divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving on 2164. i look up and two or more lights in the sky. at the time i was thinking that i was looking at stars. i was driving to Denton TX to Walmart.i was looking at them at the same time driving the things that look like stars.the things that look like star was going so fast that it was not Airplane. i do not know what it was the Colors was no from a airplane. the Colors Flashed Randomly and the star like things turn to the lift then shot off so fast that it was hard to see them.i lose sight of them when they shot off the fast as they did. i think that one when over Denton i do not know if it did our not. i hop i was not seeing things. i am not good at this my spelling is bad.
